task.title: Breakfast Sandwich
task.shortdesc: A quick recipe for breakfast sandwiches you can enjoy on the go or freeze and microwave any time! You'll need a toaster oven, large bowl, skillet, spatula, stove, paper towels and measuring cups/spoons. Yields six breakfast sandwiches!

taskbody.context:
Ingredients you will need
1 pack of English muffins
6 eggs
¼ cup chopped green onion
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
2 ½ tablespoons vegetable oil
6 oz ground breakfast sausage

step.cmd: Toast the English muffins in a toaster oven.
In a large bowl, scramble the eggs, green onions and cheddar cheese together.
Heat vegetable oil in a skillet.
Pour the egg mixture into heated skillet.
Cook both sides of the egg equally and place to the side, covered so it stays warm.
Form the sausage into six small patties.
Make six breakfast sandwiches by layering a piece of sausage and a piece of fried egg between the two pieces of the English muffins.
